about_the_game:
Dive into Avante! Atlantis, where tactical turn-based gameplay meets a captivating board game aesthetic! Embark on an epic quest through the legendary city of Atlantis, battling for power and uncovering ancient secrets.

Main Features:

  • Single-Player Campaign: Embark on an epic journey through Atlantis, battling foes and uncovering the mysteries behind the city’s long-hidden secrets;

    Multiplayer Mode: Challenge your friends in intense multiplayer battles! Initially supporting Local and LAN play for a thrilling competitive experience;

  • Board Game Experience: Roll the dice for victory! Embrace the strategic board game vibe as you roll for high numbers to deal devastating damage to your opponents;

  • Diverse Biomes: Engage in combat across five (initially planned) unique biomes, each requiring its own strategic approach;

  • Commanders: Select your Commander and lead your troops into battle! Each Commander possesses a unique special ability to turn the tide in your favor;

  • Varied Units: Deploy a wide range of units to claim victory! Utilize Infantry, Ground, Air, and Naval forces to outmaneuver your enemies;

  • Custom Map Editor: Unleash your creativity with the map editor! Design and share your own custom maps, using all the tools the game offers to craft exciting battlefields.

Will you rise to the challenge, defeating your enemies and claiming Atlantis? Will the legendary city yield to your might? The adventure awaits—Avante to glory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Avante! Atlantis is a turn-based tactics game where the rise of Atlantis triggers a fierce global race for it's domination. Lead your nation through the ever-changing, mythical city, battling foes and uncovering the secrets that kept Atlantis hidden for centuries.
supported_languages: English, French, Turkish, Ukrainian, German, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain
